name: Three Nights in Marielda
description:
Three Nights in Marielda is a fangame for the Marielda Arc of Friends at the Table.

You can listen to Friends at the Table here and give them money here!

Heists! Hangouts! Sparring! Books! 

It's just another day in Marielda, the city of first light. In fact, it's just another three days. 

The Marielda Dating Sim is a dating sim where you and your pals try and steal various things and either run into Handsome God Tuxedo Mask; or, a Cop. 

Also you're an animated marble statue.

Two routes, three endings, tons of fan service,  and generally self indulgent fun. 

Let me know what endings you get and what images you unlock!

Each route takes about 15 minutes. 

Credits:

  • Script - Jess (@jesspretend)
  • Coding/Art - Jess (@jesspretend) (DM me with Bug Reports!)
  • Ending Cards - Saumya (@aetherkids)
  • Music - Ben Sound
  • Music - 5pm -srdavis85
  • Thanks to the Lemmasoft forums for support!
